bibl.title: Kom Talit: The Rise and Fall of a Greek Town in the Faiyum.
bibl.note: The survey of Kom Talit in July 1995 initiates a project to record systematically the surface traces of ancient settlements in the Faiyum. A full report is in preparation.
bibl.seg: KIRBY Christopher and Dominic RATHBONE, Kom Talit: The Rise and Fall of a Greek Town in the Faiyum.
Egyptian Archaeology 8 (1996) pp. 29-31, 3 figg. n./bl. et coul., 1 carte.
The survey of Kom Talit in July 1995 initiates a project to record systematically the surface traces of ancient settlements in the Faiyum. A full report is in preparation.
